entity.name: The Lovers (VI) - Sacred Union - Tarot Major Arcana
entity.subtitle: Sacred Union
entity.description: A man and woman stand naked in Eden, blessed by the angel Raphael above. Behind the woman grows the Tree of Knowledge with the serpent, behind the man the Tree of Life. This is the card of choices made from love, the union of opposites, and the moment Adam chose Eve over paradiseâ€”a choice that brought both suffering and consciousness.

archetype.description: The Lovers embodies the universal archetype of sacred marriage - the alchemical union of opposites that births consciousness and new creation.
